EmailTemplate.name: Email for Revert Case
EmailTemplate.subject: The ticket has been reverted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Agent,
The ticket for {!Case.ServiceKA__Case_Type__c} ticket has been Reverted.
Please have a look on it.
Ticket Reference Number : {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Click here to view the ticket details.
Regards,
CaseMate Team
